sub_title: Marketing | Communication | TNO | Defence & Security | Art | Art exhibitions
summary:
In my function at TNO, I manage projects that give visibility to the impact of applied research and technology in the field of Defence, Safety and Security. Projects where human enhancement and technology come together. 

Besides my work at TNO I work as an artist in The Hague. My art is regularly on display at exhibitions and on my personal channels on Instagram and Artstation. You can also visit my atelier at the Noordwal in The Hague.

I have 20+ year international work experience in marketing-communication related functions in both government and industry: Advertising for Barbie, Nike and Cadbury in Russia, the European Commission in Brussels, the Dutch Embassy in Brussels, the Aluminium Association in Brussels, Therapeutic Horsemanship in the USA, the Dutch Chambers of Commerce in Sweden and the National Art Museum in The Hague.

treasury_media.title: Seabed Security
treasury_media.description: De dreiging voor onze Noordzee-infrastructuur is reëel en urgent. Vitale infrastructuur op de zeebodem moet worden beschermd tegen sabotage en digitale aanvallen. Dit is noodzakelijk om ons dagelijks leven te kunnen leiden, ervoor te zorgen dat mensen veilig kunnen leven en werken, en het milieu en het klimaat te beschermen. Innovatieve oplossingen, samenwerking tussen verschillende partijen en een gezamenlijke aanpak moeten ons helpen deze belangrijke taak te vervullen.

treasury_media.title: Doorbraak in schreeuwend personeelstekort | TNO
treasury_media.description: Nederland worstelt met een groeiend personeelstekort. Dit zet niet alleen een rem op de economische groei, maar kan ook onze veiligheid in gevaar brengen. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan het dreigend tekort aan militairen, politieagenten, gevangenisbewakers en...

awards.title: Certification  of Participation Trade & Investment Promotion
awards.description: Three day course followed by an in-week with a Dutch company. Focus on the skills and knowledge needed for successful trade and investment promotion as part of the job as senior trade officer. I deepend my knowledge on how Dutch companies go about expanding to new markets and how I can better support them in this process.
awards.issuer: Ministery of Foreign Affairs en Netherlands Enterprise Agency

courses.name: Master class 'Leadership Through Complexity' by Dave Snowden
Melcrum Course 'Storytelling for audience engagement' by Tony Quinlan

company.name: TNO Netherlands Organisation for applied scientific research

profile_positions.company: TNO Netherlands Organisation for applied scientific research
profile_positions.description: At TNO I manage marketing and communications campaigns for research projects that drive innovation in the field of Defence, Safety and Security. TNO is an organization where governments, businesses and knowledge institutes come together and drive innovation together. Working for TNO requires me to work agile with self-steering teams and in a complex environment. By building 'golden triangle' projects where government, industry and universities work together, we drive innovations that support the lives of people. Communicating clear and consistently about this, is pivotal to it's successes.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communications Defence, Safety and Security

profile_positions.description:
THE NETHERLANDS
•	Managing strategic and operational marcom activities for the museum sector and in specific the exhibitions of the Kunstmuseum in The Hague

BELGIUM
•	Leading a re-branding proces for the digitalization policy of the European Commission
•	Initiating a series of trade promotion events for the Embassy of the Netherlands in Brussels.
•	Advising SME's and sector organizations about international market opportunities and cultural differences.
• Taking care of membership relations, event organization and office management for the European aluminium association.

USA
•	Promoting and organising fundraising events and lesson programmes for equistrian based leadership and theraphy programme for people with special needs.

SWEDEN
•	Starting the regional office of the Dutch Chamber of Commerce in West-Sweden. 
•	Leading a dynamic network and knowledge sharing platform for Dutch SME's active in Sweden

RUSSIA
•	Managing advertising and marketing campaings for European and American brands: Barbie, Revlon, Nike, Cadburry and Evian
•	Organising product launches for European and Russian brands

company.name: Stichting Art & Jazz cafés Scheveningen en Den Haag

volunteer_experiences.description: Art & Jazz is a platform and community for local artists in Scheveningen and The Hague, as well as artist from other regions who feel connected wirh Scheveningen. We bring together art, music and poetry.

WLI is a dynamic, diverse and dedicated community of women, each aspiring to rise to her greatest level of potential while encouraging others to do the same. The WLI community represents today’s women as we acknowledge and validate their accomplishments, as we inspire them to do more, to have more and to be more, and to play their role in the creation of a stronger, healthier, more prosperous tomorrow.
Network of Dutch professionals in Brussels aiming to foster new opportunities and alliances.

National PTA® comprises millions of families, students, teachers, administrators, and business and community leaders devoted to the educational success of children and the promotion of parent involvement in schools.

company.name: Penn State College of Agricultural Sciences

volunteer_experiences.description: The Pennsylvania 4-H Horse Program promotes knowledge of horsemanship and responsible, ethical equine use, care, and management. Youth who participate in 4-H horse programs develop life skills that include leadership, responsibility, sportsmanship, teamwork, community service, a positive attitude, and a sense of self worth.
